resources.string: Is fearr an tsláinte ná na táinte
A good start is half the work.
Níl aon tintéan mar thintéan fhéin
There’s no fireplace like your own
Ní neart go cur le chéile
Is minic a bhris béal duine a shrón
It\'s often a mouth that breaks ones nose
Mol an oige agus tiocfaidh sí
Encourage youth and they shall succeed
Nuair a bhíonn an fíon istigh, bíonn an ciall amuigh
When the wine is in, sense is out
